ProductInfo.Features:

<8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit + <10> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <11> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower +
<12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Screen Protectors
